languages.text: Верховный демон Предел рассвета, обративший мир Ефрат-II в свое логово, был указующим перстом и советником {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости, открывающим прихотливую волю Владыки Перемен и предупреждающим об угрозах. Так было до поры, пока Пути не изменились, и {name} фон Валанциус с Пределом рассвета не обратились во врагов, сражающихся за власть в Просторе. В кипящем энергиями варпе ничто не постоянно и никакой союз не крепок.

The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.
languages.original_text: Верховный демон Предел рассвета, обративший мир Ефрат-II в свое логово, был указующим перстом и советником {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости, открывающим прихотливую волю Владыки Перемен и предупреждающим об угрозах. Так было до поры, пока Пути не изменились, и {name} фон Валанциус с Пределом рассвета не обратились во врагов, сражающихся за власть в Просторе. В кипящем энергиями варпе ничто не постоянно и никакой союз не крепок.

traits.locale_text: Edge of Daybreak, a greater daemon, who turned Eufrates II into his den, was a pointing finger and an advisor to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, opening an intricate will of the Lord of Change, and warning about threats. This was the case until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and Edge of Daybreak turned into enemies, fighting for the power in the expanse. In the warp boiling with energies, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

languages.text: 名叫“破晓锋刃”的高阶恶魔将欧夫拉茨二号星变成了他的巢穴，成为了行商浪人的顾问，向{mf|他|她}揭示了诡变魔君的复杂意志，并警告迫近的威胁。但在那之后，命运的道路发生了变化。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯与诡变魔君成为了敌人，在科罗努斯扩区中争夺力量。在汹涌的亚空间里里，没有什么是永恒的，也不存在一成不变的同盟关系。
languages.original_text: The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

traits.locale_text: 名叫“破晓锋刃”的高阶恶魔将欧夫拉茨二号星变成了他的巢穴，成为了行商浪人的顾问，向他揭示了诡变魔君的复杂意志，并警告迫近的威胁。在这之后，命运的道路发生了变化。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯与诡变魔君成为了敌人，在科罗努斯扩区中争夺力量。在沸腾的亚空间里里，没有什么是永恒的，也没有什么同盟关系可以一直牢固不变。

languages.text: Der Rand des Tagesanbruchs, ein großer Dämon, der Eufrates II in sein Versteck verwandelte, diente {mf|seiner|ihrer} {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} als Berater. Er verkündete den undurchsichtigen Willen des Herrschers des Wandels und warnte {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} vor Gefahren. So ging das, bis der Pfad sich änderte und {name} von Valancius und der Rand des Tagesanbruchs Feinde wurden, die um die Macht in der Ausdehnung konkurrierten. Im tosenden Warp hält nichts ewig und kein Bündnis ist stark.
languages.original_text: The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

traits.locale_text: Der Rand des Tagesanbruchs, ein großer Dämon, der Eufrates II in sein Versteck verwandelte, diente {mf|seiner|ihrer} {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} als Berater. Er verkündete den undurchsichtigen Willen des Herrschers des Wandels und warnte vor Gefahren. So ging das, bis der Pfad sich änderte und {name} von Valancius und der Rand des Tagesanbruchs Feinde wurden, die um die Macht in der Ausdehnung konkurrierten. Im kochenden Warp hält nichts ewig und kein Bündnis ist stark.

languages.text: La Lame de l'Aube, le démon majeur qui s'était établi sur Euphrate-II, devint le conseiller de Sa Seigneurie. Il lui révélait les volontés complexes du Duc du Changement et les dangers qui {mf|le|la} menaçaient, jusqu'à ce que la Voie change. {name} von Valancius et le démon devinrent alors des ennemis rivalisant pour dominer les Étendues. Dans le tumulte du Warp, tout est précaire, même les alliances.
languages.original_text: The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

traits.locale_text: La Lame de l'Aube, le démon majeur qui s'était établi sur Euphrate-II, devint le conseiller de Sa Seigneurie. Il lui révélait les volontés complexes du Duc du Changement et les dangers qui {mf|le|la} menaçaient, jusqu'à ce que la Voie change. {name} von Valancius et le démon devinrent alors des ennemis rivalisant pour dominer les Étendues. Dans le tumulte du Warp, tout est précaire, même les alliances.

languages.text: El Filo del Amanecer, el daemon mayor que convirtió Eufrates II en su guarida, fue asesor y consejero de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, revelándole la compleja voluntad del Señor de la Transformación y advirtiéndo{mf|le|la} sobre futuras amenazas. Esta situación continuó hasta que el Camino cambió y {name} von Valancius se convirtió en enemig{mf|o|a} del Filo del Amanecer, contra el que se enfrentó por el dominio de la Extensión. En la disformidad hirviente nada es para siempre y toda alianza es frágil.
languages.original_text: The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

traits.locale_text: El Filo del Amanecer, un daemon mayor que convirtió Eufrates II en su guarida, fue asesor y consejero de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, revelándole la compleja voluntad del Señor de la Transformación y advirtiéndo{mf|le|la} sobre futuras amenazas. Esta situación continuó hasta que el Camino cambió y {name} von Valancius se convirtió en enemig{mf|o|a} del Filo del Amanecer, contra el que se enfrentó por el dominio de la Extensión. En la disformidad hirviente nada es para siempre y toda alianza es frágil.

languages.text: ユーフラテス・IIを自分の巣窟に変えたグレーターディーモンである暁の刃は、陛下に指導と助言を与え、ロード・オヴ・チェンジの入り組んだ意志を明らかにし、脅威について警告した。この状況は道が変わり、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスと暁の刃が敵対し、エクスパンスで権力を争うようになるまで続いた。荒れ狂う歪みに永遠はなく、いかなる同盟も強固ではないのだ。
languages.original_text: The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

traits.locale_text: ユーフラテス・IIを自分の巣窟に変えたグレーターディーモンである暁の刃は、陛下に指導と助言を与え、ロード・オヴ・チェンジの入り組んだ意志を明らかにし、脅威について警告した。この状況は道が変わり、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスと暁の刃が敵対し、エクスパンスで権力を争うようになるまで続いた。荒れ狂う歪みに永遠はなく、いかなる同盟も強固ではないのだ。

languages.text: Eufrates II'yi inine dönüştüren Büyük İblis Tan Vakti, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne kılavuzluk ve danışmanlık yaptı, Değişim Lordu'nun çetrefilli arzularını ona açık etti ve tehditler konusunda onu uyardı. Bu durum, Yol değişene dek sürdü. Ardından {name} von Valancius ve Tan Vakti, Enginlik'te daha fazla güç elde etme rekabetine tutuşup birbirlerine düşman oldu. Hiddetin hüküm sürdüğü öteboyutta hiçbir şey sonsuz, hiçbir ittifak da sağlam değildir.
languages.original_text: The Edge of Daybreak, the Greater Daemon who turned Eufrates II into his lair, provided guidance and counsel to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, revealing the intricate will of the Lord of Change and warning {mf|him|her} about threats. This remained so until the Path changed and {name} von Valancius and the Edge of Daybreak became enemies vying for power in the Expanse. In the raging warp, nothing is forever, and no alliance is strong.

traits.locale_text: Eufrates II'yi ini hâline getirmiş Büyük İblis Tan Vakti, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne kılavuzluk ve danışmanlık sağladı, Değişim Lordu'nun çetrefilli arzularını ona açık etti ve tehditler konusunda onu uyardı. Bu durum, Yol değişene kadar sürdü. Ardından {name} von Valancius ve Tan Vakti, Enginlik'te daha fazla güç elde etme rekabetine tutuştu ve düşman hâline geldiler. Öteboyutun hiddetinin içinde hiçbir şey sonsuza değin kalmaz, hiçbir ittifak güçlü değildir.
